channel.title: CVE Feed for HP Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HP Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-5113|2024-08-02T07:44:53.782Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20enterprise%20laserjet%2C%20laserjet%20managed%20printers
item.description: Certain HP Enterprise LaserJet and HP LaserJet Managed Printers are potentially vulnerable to denial of service due to WS-Print request and potential injections of Cross Site Scripting via jQuery-UI.

item.title: CVE-2023-5409|2024-08-02T07:59:44.712Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20t430%20and%20t638%20thin%20clients
item.description: HP is aware of a potential security vulnerability in HP t430 and t638 Thin Client PCs. These models may be susceptible to a physical attack, allowing an untrusted source to tamper with the system firmware using a publicly disclosed private key. HP is providing recommended guidance for customers to reduce exposure to the potential vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-5449|2024-08-02T07:59:44.702Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20displays
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in certain HP Displays supporting the Theft Deterrence feature which may allow a monitorâ€™s Theft Deterrence to be deactivated.

item.title: CVE-2023-35178|2024-08-02T16:23:59.691Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20laserjet%20pro
item.description: Certain HP LaserJet Pro print products are potentially vulnerable to Buffer Overflow when performing a GET request to scan jobs.

item.title: CVE-2023-35177|2024-08-02T16:23:59.451Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20laserjet%20pro
item.description: Certain HP LaserJet Pro print products are potentially vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow related to the compact font format parser.

item.title: CVE-2023-5739|2024-08-02T08:07:32.640Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20pc%20hardware%20diagnostics%20windows
item.description: Certain versions of HP PC Hardware Diagnostics Windows are potentially vulnerable to elevation of privilege.

item.title: CVE-2023-1707|2024-08-02T05:57:24.901Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20enterprise%20laserjet%20and%20hp%20laserjet%20managed%20printers
item.description: Certain HP Enterprise LaserJet and HP LaserJet Managed Printers are potentially vulnerable to information disclosure when IPsec is enabled with FutureSmart version 5.6.

item.title: CVE-2023-35175|2024-08-02T16:23:59.603Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20laserjet%20pro
item.description: Certain HP LaserJet Pro print products are potentially vulnerable to Potential Remote Code Execution and/or Elevation of Privilege via Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) using the Web Service Eventing model.

item.title: CVE-2023-27973|2024-08-02T12:23:30.813Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20laserjet%20pro
item.description: Certain HP LaserJet Pro print products are potentially vulnerable to Heap Overflow and/or Remote Code Execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-26296|2024-08-02T11:46:24.335Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20device%20manager
item.description: Previous versions of HP Device Manager (prior to HPDM 5.0.10) could potentially allow command injection and/or elevation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-26299|2024-08-02T11:46:24.488Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20pc%20products%20using%20ami%20uefi%20firmware
item.description: A potential Time-of-Check to Time-of-Use (TOCTOU) vulnerability has been identified in certain HP PC products using AMI UEFI Firmware (system BIOS), which might allow arbitrary code execution. AMI has released updates to mitigate the potential vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-4499|2024-08-02T07:31:06.278Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20thinupdate
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in the HP ThinUpdate utility (also known as HP Recovery Image and Software Download Tool) which may lead to information disclosure. HP is releasing mitigation for the potential vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-27972|2024-08-02T12:23:30.801Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20laserjet%20pro
item.description: Certain HP LaserJet Pro print products are potentially vulnerable to Buffer Overflow and/or Remote Code Execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-26301|2024-08-02T11:46:23.942Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20laserjet%20pro
item.description: Certain HP LaserJet Pro print products are potentially vulnerable to an Elevation of Privilege and/or Information Disclosure related to a lack of authentication with certain endpoints.

item.title: CVE-2023-4694|2024-08-02T07:37:59.347Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20officejet%20pro%20printers
item.description: Certain HP OfficeJet Pro printers are potentially vulnerable to a Denial of Service when sending a SOAP message to the service on TCP port 3911 that contains a body but no header.

item.title: CVE-2023-27971|2024-08-02T12:23:30.802Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20laserjet%20pro
item.description: Certain HP LaserJet Pro print products are potentially vulnerable to Buffer Overflow and/or Elevation of Privilege.

item.title: CVE-2023-26298|2024-08-02T11:46:23.550Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20device%20manager
item.description: Previous versions of HP Device Manager (prior to HPDM 5.0.10) could potentially allow command injection and/or elevation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-32673|2024-08-02T15:25:36.884Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20pc%20hardware%20diagnostics%20windows%2C%20hp%20image%20assistant%2C%20and%20hp%20thunderbolt%20dock%20g2%20firmware
item.description: Certain versions of HP PC Hardware Diagnostics Windows, HP Image Assistant, and HP Thunderbolt Dock G2 Firmware are potentially vulnerable to elevation of privilege.

item.title: CVE-2023-26297|2024-08-02T11:46:23.949Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20device%20manager
item.description: Previous versions of HP Device Manager (prior to HPDM 5.0.10) could potentially allow command injection and/or elevation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-5671|2024-08-02T08:07:32.336Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20print%20and%20scan%20doctor%20for%20windows
item.description: HP Print and Scan Doctor for Windows may potentially be vulnerable to escalation of privilege. HP is releasing software updates to mitigate the potential vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-35176|2024-08-02T16:23:59.364Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20laserjet%20pro
item.description: Certain HP LaserJet Pro print products are potentially vulnerable to Buffer Overflow and/or Denial of Service when using the backup & restore feature through the embedded web service on the device.

item.title: CVE-2023-5365|2024-08-02T07:59:44.377Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20life%20android%20mobile
item.description: HP LIFE Android Mobile application is potentially vulnerable to escalation of privilege and/or information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2023-26300|2024-08-02T11:46:23.908Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20pc%20products
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in the system BIOS for certain HP PC products which might allow escalation of privilege. HP is releasing firmware updates to mitigate the potential vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-1526|2024-08-02T05:49:11.657Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20designjet%20and%20pagewide%20xl
item.description: Certain DesignJet and PageWide XL TAA compliant models may have risk of potential information disclosure if the hard disk drive is physically removed from the printer.

item.title: CVE-2023-1329|2024-08-02T05:41:00.231Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20multifunction%20printers
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified for certain HP multifunction printers (MFPs). The vulnerability may lead to Buffer Overflow and/or Remote Code Execution when running HP Workpath solutions on potentially affected products.

item.title: CVE-2023-32674|2024-08-02T15:25:36.495Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20pc%20hardware%20diagnostics%20windows
item.description: Certain versions of HP PC Hardware Diagnostics Windows are potentially vulnerable to buffer overflow.

item.title: CVE-2023-26294|2024-08-02T11:46:23.908Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20device%20manager
item.description: Previous versions of HP Device Manager (prior to HPDM 5.0.10) could potentially allow command injection and/or elevation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-26295|2024-08-02T11:46:24.486Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20device%20manager
item.description: Previous versions of HP Device Manager (prior to HPDM 5.0.10) could potentially allow command injection and/or elevation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-6138|2024-08-02T08:21:17.709Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20workstation%20pcs
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in the system BIOS for certain HP Workstation PCs, which might allow escalation of privilege, arbitrary code execution, or denial of service. HP is releasing mitigation for the potential vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-28893|2024-08-02T01:03:50.249Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20software%20packages%20%28softpaqs%29
item.description: Certain HP software packages (SoftPaqs) are potentially vulnerable to arbitrary code execution when the SoftPaq configuration file has been modified after extraction. HP has released updated software packages (SoftPaqs).

item.title: CVE-2024-29080|2024-08-02T01:03:51.767Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20display%20control
item.description: Potential vulnerabilities have been identified in the HP Display Control software component within the HP Application Enabling Software Driver which might allow escalation of privilege.

item.title: CVE-2024-27460|2024-08-02T00:34:52.265Z -- hp%20inc. -- plantronics%20hub
item.description: A privilege escalation exists in the updater for Plantronics Hub 3.25.1 and below.

item.title: CVE-2024-3281|2024-08-01T20:05:08.210Z -- hp%20inc. -- poly%20ccx%20devices
item.description: A vulnerability was discovered in the firmware builds after 8.0.2.3267 and prior to 8.1.3.1301 in CCX devices. A flaw in the firmware build process did not properly restrict access to a resource from an unauthorized actor.

item.title: CVE-2024-4143|2024-08-01T20:33:52.408Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20pc%20products
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in certain HP PC products using AMI BIOS, which might allow arbitrary code execution. AMI has released firmware updates to mitigate this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-1695|2024-08-01T18:48:21.737Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20application%20enabling%20software%20driver
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in the HP Application Enabling Software Driver for certain HP PC products, which might allow escalation of privilege. HP is releasing software updates to mitigate this potential vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-0794|2024-08-01T18:18:18.528Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20laserjet%20pro%2C%20hp%20enterprise%20laserjet%2C%20hp%20laserjet%20managed%20printers
item.description: Certain HP LaserJet Pro, HP Enterprise LaserJet, and HP LaserJet Managed Printers are potentially vulnerable to Remote Code Execution due to buffer overflow when rendering fonts embedded in a PDF file.

item.title: CVE-2024-1869|2024-08-01T18:56:21.990Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20designjet
item.description: Certain HP DesignJet print products are potentially vulnerable to information disclosure related to accessing memory out-of-bounds when using the general-purpose gateway (GGW) over port 9220.

item.title: CVE-2024-0407|2024-08-01T18:04:49.658Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20enterprise%20laserjet%2C%20hp%20laserjet%20managed%20printers
item.description: Certain HP Enterprise LaserJet, and HP LaserJet Managed Printers are potentially vulnerable to information disclosure, when connections made by the device back to services enabled by some solutions may have been trusted without the appropriate CA certificate in the device's certificate store.

item.title: CVE-2024-1174|2024-08-01T18:33:24.143Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20thinpro%208.0
item.description: Previous versions of HP ThinPro (prior to HP ThinPro 8.0 SP 8) could potentially contain security vulnerabilities. HP has released HP ThinPro 8.0 SP 8, which includes updates to mitigate potential vulnerabilities.

item.title: CVE-2024-29080|2024-07-26T15:23:58.604Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20display%20control
item.description: Potential vulnerabilities have been identified in the HP Display Control software component within the HP Application Enabling Software Driver which might allow escalation of privilege.

item.title: CVE-2024-2301|2024-07-24T16:55:37.063Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20laserjet%20pro%20devices
item.description: Certain HP LaserJet Pro devices are potentially vulnerable to a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attack via the web management interface of the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-2300|2024-07-19T19:52:09.327Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20advance%20mobile%20application
item.description: HP Advance Mobile Applications for iOS and Android are potentially vulnerable to information disclosure when using an outdated version of the application via mobile devices.

item.title: CVE-2024-4143|2024-07-15T21:46:41.838Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20pc%20products
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in certain HP PC products using AMI BIOS, which might allow arbitrary code execution. AMI has released firmware updates to mitigate this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-27540|2024-06-28T19:00:28.307Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20pc%20bios
item.description: A potential Time-of-Check to Time-of Use (TOCTOU) vulnerability has been identified in the HP BIOS for certain HP PC products, which might allow arbitrary code execution, denial of service, and information disclosure. HP is releasing BIOS updates to mitigate the potential vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-5410|2024-03-12T20:01:46.531Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20pc%20bios
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been reported in the system BIOS of certain HP PC products, which might allow memory tampering. HP is releasing mitigation for the potential vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-4063|2024-06-04T17:27:20.275Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20officejet%20pro%20printers
item.description: Certain HP OfficeJet Pro printers are potentially vulnerable to a Denial of Service when using an improper eSCL URL GET request.

item.title: CVE-2023-6138|2024-02-14T22:12:16.966Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20workstation%20pcs
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in the system BIOS for certain HP Workstation PCs, which might allow escalation of privilege, arbitrary code execution, or denial of service. HP is releasing mitigation for the potential vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-28893|2024-06-04T18:03:29.967Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20software%20packages%20%28softpaqs%29
item.description: Certain HP software packages (SoftPaqs) are potentially vulnerable to arbitrary code execution when the SoftPaq configuration file has been modified after extraction. HP has released updated software packages (SoftPaqs).

item.title: CVE-2024-5143|2024-06-04T18:02:37.631Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20laserjet%20pro%20printers
item.description: A user with device administrative privileges can change existing SMTP server settings on the device, without having to re-enter SMTP server credentials. By redirecting send-to-email traffic to the new server, the original SMTP server credentials may potentially be exposed.

item.title: CVE-2024-1869|2024-03-01T21:31:06.701Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20designjet
item.description: Certain HP DesignJet print products are potentially vulnerable to information disclosure related to accessing memory out-of-bounds when using the general-purpose gateway (GGW) over port 9220.

item.title: CVE-2024-1695|2024-05-06T20:47:35.746Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20application%20enabling%20software%20driver
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in the HP Application Enabling Software Driver for certain HP PC products, which might allow escalation of privilege. HP is releasing software updates to mitigate this potential vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-1174|2024-03-01T19:39:26.840Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20thinpro%208.0
item.description: Previous versions of HP ThinPro (prior to HP ThinPro 8.0 SP 8) could potentially contain security vulnerabilities. HP has released HP ThinPro 8.0 SP 8, which includes updates to mitigate potential vulnerabilities.

item.title: CVE-2024-0794|2024-02-21T00:59:55.383Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20laserjet%20pro%2C%20hp%20enterprise%20laserjet%2C%20hp%20laserjet%20managed%20printers
item.description: Certain HP LaserJet Pro, HP Enterprise LaserJet, and HP LaserJet Managed Printers are potentially vulnerable to Remote Code Execution due to buffer overflow when rendering fonts embedded in a PDF file.

item.title: CVE-2024-0407|2024-02-21T01:01:07.745Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20enterprise%20laserjet%2C%20hp%20laserjet%20managed%20printers
item.description: Certain HP Enterprise LaserJet, and HP LaserJet Managed Printers are potentially vulnerable to information disclosure, when connections made by the device back to services enabled by some solutions may have been trusted without the appropriate CA certificate in the device's certificate store.

item.title: CVE-2024-27460|2024-05-10T20:23:40.777Z -- hp%20inc. -- plantronics%20hub
item.description: A privilege escalation exists in the updater for Plantronics Hub 3.25.1 and below.

item.description: A vulnerability was discovered in the firmware builds after 8.0.2.3267 and prior to 8.1.3.1301 in CCX devices. A flaw in the firmware build process did not properly restrict access to a resource from an unauthorized actor.

item.description: HP Advance Mobile Applications for iOS and Android are potentially vulnerable to information disclosure when using an outdated version of the application via mobile devices.

item.description: Certain HP Enterprise LaserJet, and HP LaserJet Managed Printers are potentially vulnerable to information disclosure, when connections made by the device back to services enabled by some solutions may have been trusted without the appropriate CA certificate in the device's certificate store.

item.description: Potential vulnerabilities have been identified in the HP Display Control software component within the HP Application Enabling Software Driver which might allow escalation of privilege.

item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been reported in the system BIOS of certain HP PC products, which might allow memory tampering. HP is releasing mitigation for the potential vulnerability.

item.description: Potential vulnerabilities have been identified in the HP Display Control software component within the HP Application Enabling Software Driver which might allow escalation of privilege.

item.description: A user with device administrative privileges can change existing SMTP server settings on the device, without having to re-enter SMTP server credentials. By redirecting send-to-email traffic to the new server, the original SMTP server credentials may potentially be exposed.
